DOC.brief_summary: 100 woman infertility classify 2 group . Group A : Included 50 woman give clomiphene citrate 50mg ( clomid ) orally 2 times/day 2rd-7th day cycle sildeaynafil citrate 20mg tab 7th-11th day cycle orally 3 times/day . Group B : Included 50 woman give clomiphene citrate 50mg ( clomid ) orally 2 times/day 2rd-7th day cycle placebo tablet 7th-11th day cycle orally 3 times/day .
DOC.detailed_description: 100 woman infertility classify 2 group . Group A : Included 50 woman give clomiphene citrate 50mg ( clomid ) orally 2 times/day 2rd-7th day cycle sildeaynafil citrate 20mg tab 7th-11th day cycle orally 3 times/day . Group B : Included 50 woman give clomiphene citrate 50mg ( clomid ) orally 2 times/day 2rd-7th day cycle placebo tablet 7th-11th day cycle orally 3 times/day . Folliculometry assess : - Transvaginal ultrasound : It do day 11th cycle detect number follicle endometrial thickness . When follicle reach â‰¥18 ml , injection 5000 IU HCG IM trigger ovulation group . Pregnancy assess : - Beta HCG test : ( Radioimmunoassay )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Infertile woman whether 's primary secondary infertility 2 . Woman 's age : ( 1835 year old ) 3 . Menstrual cycle ( 2435 day ) 4 . Normal semen analysis 1 . Age 35 year old 2 . Ovarian cysts 3 . Abnormal hormonal profile ( e.g hyperprolactinaemia ) 4 . Significant cardiovascular disease 5 . Serious liver disease renal failure 6 . Poorly control diabetes mellitus
